    • Method Detail

      • findPassword

        @Nullable
@CheckReturnValue
public static java.lang.String findPassword​(@Nonnull
                                            RoutingContext context)
        Attempts to find a password in a request. The password will be read from the following locations, in order, with the first one present being returned.
        • The Authorization header
        • A websocket protocol which starts with andesite-password: (the returned password will have this prefix stripped)
        • The password query param
        If the websocket protocol is matched, it's value will be inserted into the Sec-WebSocket-Protocol header of the response.
        Parameters:
        context - Context where the password should be located.
        Returns:
        The password located, or null if nothing was found.

      • decodeTrack

        @Nullable
@CheckReturnValue
public static com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.track.AudioTrack decodeTrack​(@Nonnull
                                                                            com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayerManager playerManager,
                                                                            @Nonnull
                                                                            java.lang.String base64)
        Decodes an audio track from it's base64 representation.
        Parameters:
        playerManager - Player manager used for decoding (must have the source manager enabled).
        base64 - Base64 encoded track.
        Returns:
        The decoded track.

      • encodeFailure

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static JsonObject encodeFailure​(@Nonnull
                                       RoutingContext context)
        Encodes the failure of the context. Equivalent to encodeThrowable(context, context.failure())
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the request.
        Returns:
        An encoded version of the exception.
        See Also:
        encodeThrowable(RoutingContext, Throwable)

      • encodeThrowable

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static JsonObject encodeThrowable​(@Nonnull
                                         RoutingContext context,
                                         @Nonnull
                                         java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Encodes the provided throwable, based on the context for deciding whether or not to use a shorter version with less details (omit stacktraces).
        Parameters:
        context - Context for the request.
        throwable - Error to encode.
        Returns:
        An encoded version of the exception.

      • encodeThrowableShort

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static JsonObject encodeThrowableShort​(@Nonnull
                                              java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Encodes a throwable with minimal details (omits stacktraces).
        Parameters:
        throwable - Error to encode.
        Returns:
        An encoded version of the exception.

      • encodeThrowableDetailed

        @Nonnull
@CheckReturnValue
public static JsonObject encodeThrowableDetailed​(@Nonnull
                                                 java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Encodes a throwable with as many details as possible. The resulting object may be very large.
        Parameters:
        throwable - Error to encode.
        Returns:
        An encoded version of the exception.
